thread.section_title: Saatchi Art Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Saatchi Art | saatchiart.com | 2 of 54
thread.title: Jukka

author: Jukka
title: Jukka
text:
...you should deliver customer's phone number to FedEx. My package was just lying in their their warehouse for a week because they didnt know how to contact me. They had tried to deliver my order ONCE but that was that.
Ps. Also the correct fedex reference number wasnt in the email where was the link to the tracking page.
Pps. Still, Im very happy with the product and would recommend you to others:-)
